title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Web-Based Pharmacy Dispensing Skill Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret prescriptions and perform dispensing procedures in a virtual pharmacy environment.
Learners can comply with medication interaction and side-effect verification protocols at an 80% or higher rate within simulations.
Learners can demonstrate the ability to identify and correct errors in the dispensing process through a simulation-based evaluation system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
